featured.text: When the shuttle touches the land, a drag parachute opens to steady the aircraft, get the speed right, and help the brakes on the landing-gear wheels to bring it to a complete stop. 49.
The skydiver managed to land safely after jumping out of the aircraft, even though her _____ failed to open in midair.
Circular shapes are also stronger and resist deformation, and therefore can 20 extreme differences in pressure inside and outside of an aircraft.

definition.zh_def: 一種能在空中飛行的交通工具，通常用於運輸乘客或貨物。
definition.en_def: A vehicle designed for air travel that is capable of flight, typically used for transporting passengers or cargo.
definition.example: The aircraft took off smoothly from the runway.
